reporting_cycle: The Panel of Experts is to provide a midterm report by 9 November 2014, a final report by 9 May 2015, and submit these to the Council by 9 December 2014 and 9 June 2015 respectively. The Panel is also to provide a planned program of work within thirty days of reappointment and any updates thereto.
summary:
The Security Council,

Recalling previous relevant resolutions on Iran, 
Decides to extend until 9 July 2015 the mandate of the Panel of Experts, 
established to monitor sanctions on Iran, 
Requests the Panel to provide a midterm report by 9 December 2014 and a final report by 9 June 2015, 
Requests the Panel to provide a planned program of work within 30 days of reappointment, 
Urges States and UN bodies to cooperate fully with the Committee and Panel, 
Expresses intent to continue following the Panel's work, 
Decides to remain actively seized of the matter.
